extension.summary: Forward XBMC events to an A/V Control server
extension.description: This addon will intercept XBMC events (such as key presses or other events) and convert them into A/V control commands being sent to the A/V Controller listening at /tmp/av_control.
extension.disclaimer: Depends on keymap configuration to trigger this script with event arguments which will be converted into A/V commands by this script. Also depends on an A/V Controller listening on /tmp/av_control.
